alert.note: Alert for Barry; McDonald (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 09 at 7:30PM CDT until August 09 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... McDonald County in southwestern Missouri... Southern Barry County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 730 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Pineville, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Table Rock Lake, Roaring River State Park, Big Sugar Creek State Park, Cassville, Anderson, Noel, Shell Knob, Goodman, South West City, Seligman, Pineville, Exeter, Washburn, Lanagan, Golden, Emerald Beach, Eagle Rock, Chain-O-Lakes, Arrow Point and Wayne. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 1 and 12. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southwestern Missouri.
